MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn is still ongoing. This is due to excavation difficulties on site. Once we receive information from our engineers on site we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.16PM on 14th October 2020.
